meta.description: Open Street Map base layer

attribution.text: © OpenStreetMap contributors

meta.description: The layer shows the risk category within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, based on flood depth (m) expected for a 10-year return period, meaning there is a 10% chance of exceeding a predefined flood level in any given year. The analysis is based on hydrological and hydrodynamic models from JRC.

attribution.text: River Flood Hazard Maps at European and Global Scale

meta.description: The layer shows the risk category  within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, based on flood depth (m) expected for a 50-year return period, meaning there is a 2% chance of exceeding a predefined flood level in any given year. The analysis is based on hydrological and hydrodynamic models from JRC.

attribution.text: River Flood Hazard Maps at European and Global Scale

meta.description: The layer shows the risk category  within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, based on flood depth (m) expected for a 100-year return period, meaning there is a 1% chance of exceeding that flood level in any given year. The analysis is based on hydrological and hydrodynamic models from JRC.

attribution.text: River Flood Hazard Maps at European and Global Scale

meta.description: The layer shows the risk category  within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, based on flood depth (m) expected for a 500-year return period, meaning there is a 0.2% chance of exceeding a predefined flood level in any given year. The analysis is based on hydrological and hydrodynamic models from JRC.

attribution.text: River Flood Hazard Maps at European and Global Scale

meta.description: Land Cover inventory for 44 thematic classes for the 2018 reference year.

attribution.text: CORINE

categories.label: 122 - Road and rail networks and associated land
241 - Annual crops associated with permanent crops
243 - Land principally occupied by agriculture with significant areas of natural vegetation

meta.description: The layer shows the flood risk category within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, determined by the frequency (%) of the intersecting pixels detected as flooded across all 5-day composite VIIRS images from Jan 2012 to Dec 2024, reflecting how often those pixels appeared flooded compared to the total number of images.

attribution.text: NOAA Satellite Proving Ground Global Flood Products Archive

meta.description: Land Cover inventory for 44 thematic classes for the 2018 reference year.

attribution.text: CORINE land cover

categories.label: 122 - Road and rail networks and associated land
241 - Annual crops associated with permanent crops
243 - Land principally occupied by agriculture with significant areas of natural vegetation

meta.description: The layer shows the flood risk category within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, determined by the frequency (%) of the intersecting pixels detected as flooded across all 5-day composite VIIRS images from Jan 2012 to Dec 2024 and Sentinel-1 imagery, reflecting how often those pixels appeared flooded compared to the total number of images.

attribution.text: NOAA Satellite Proving Ground Global Flood Products Archive & Copernicus Sentinel-1

sources.name: Risk of Number of precipitation days exceeding 20 mm - 90th Percentile (1950-2019)

meta.description: The layer shows the extreme rainfall risk category within a 100m buffer along the railway lines, based on the 90th percentile of the number of days per year when the daily rainfall amount exceeded 20mm using rainfall data from 1950 to 2019. In simple terms, it highlights areas at risk of experiencing frequent heavy rainfall days each year.

attribution.text: Extreme precipitation risk indicators for Europe and European cities from 1950 to 2019. This dataset was produced on behalf of the Copernicus Climate Change Service.

meta.description: The layer represents land subsidence risk categories in areas with slopes less than 10% across the railway lines in Sicily, Italy. The analysis is based on ground motion velocity data provided by the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS).

attribution.text: EGMS

meta.description: The layer represents landslides risk categories in areas with slopes more than 10% across the railway lines in Sicily, Italy. The analysis is based on ground motion velocity data provided by the European Ground Motion Service (EGMS).

attribution.text: EGMS

sources.name: Land Subsidence Risk Map - Sicily (Small Region 1)

meta.description: The layer represents land subsidence risk categories in areas with slopes less than 10% across the railway lines of small region (Region-1) in Sicily, Italy. The analysis is based on ground velocity and displacement time series derived from InSAR processing of six years of Sentinel-1 data specifically over this area.

attribution.text: Copernicus Sentinel-1

layout.interfaceGroup: Ground Movement Risk - Parts in Sicily
